ValidationRule.description: You don't have the right to edit the some Client's Fields !!!!!!!---Temporary----!!!!!!!
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($User.BypassVR__c ) && OR ( ISCHANGED(Firstname2__pc), ISCHANGED(Lastname2__pc), ISCHANGED(HomePhoneCountrycode__pc), ISCHANGED(PersonHomePhone), ISCHANGED(BirthdateYear__pc), ISCHANGED(BirthdateMonth__pc), ISCHANGED(BirthdateDay__pc), ISCHANGED(Nationality__pc), ISCHANGED(PassportNumber__pc), ISCHANGED(Phone), ISCHANGED(PreferredLanguage__pc), ISCHANGED(PrimaryAddressLine1__pc), ISCHANGED(PrimaryAddressLine2__pc), ISCHANGED(PrimaryAddressLine3__pc), ISCHANGED(PrimaryCity__pc), ISCHANGED(PrimaryZipCode__pc), ISCHANGED(PrimaryStateProvince__pc), ISCHANGED(PrimaryCountry__pc), ISCHANGED(Gender__pc), ISCHANGED(Title__pc) ) && $Profile.Name <> "ICON_Interface DREAM" && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "LV_Interface_Datastage" && $Profile.Name <> "VO Interface Batch" && $Profile.Name <> "LV Pass integration" && $User.Alias <> "autoproc" && !BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'ICONiCS') && !BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'ICON') && RecordType.Name ="Person Account" && NOT( IsProspect__pc ) && NOT( SPO_BypassVR__pc )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have the right to edit Some Client's Fields.
